title: The Kids in the Hall: Comedy Punks
overview: Through never-before-seen archival footage and interviews with celebrities, industry insiders and the "Kids" themselvesâ€” this two-part documentary delves into this cult-famous comedy troupe's origins in the mid-1980s and provides inside access to their 40-year journey across five seasons of their renowned television series, a controversial feature film and multiple sold-out tours.
